parameters.name: IpaddrList
parameters.description:
The IP addresses.

>  You must specify at least one of the IpaddrList, RegionList, and ResourceTypeList parameters.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: RegionList
parameters.description:
The regions.

>  You must specify at least one of the IpaddrList, RegionList, and ResourceTypeList parameters.

parameters.name: ResourceTypeList
parameters.description:
The types of the assets.

> You must specify at least one of the IpaddrList, RegionList, and ResourceTypeList parameters.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
